metadata.name: CHERRY | SELFIE ERGO SUM | MR. SAVETHEWALL | #1/75
metadata.description:
## **Mr.Savethewall is the first artist to create NFTs for [deodato.io,](https://deodato.io/) the new digital asset platform of the Deodato Group**

An innovative collection, which is part of the new and exclusive ***"Mixed Phygital"*** project, in which digital screens are added to the artist's iconic physical ***"Wallsaved"*** to view and enjoy these NFTs.

The works have his **iconic frog as protagonist**, in a layered story that traces the symbols of his career and of the greats who inspired him, thus transforming into a perfect **mix between physical and digital work**, creating ***Phygital works*** exclusively for the Deodato Arte Gallery .

[***Discover the Phygital Wallsaved here***](https://www.deodato.com/deodato_arte_italy/artisti/mr-savethewall/mr-savethewall-special-projects/mixed-phygital.html)



**Mr. Savethewall's NFTs are available for purchase in the Deodato Arte Galleries from 30 March 2023 and on the new [Deodato.io](https://deodato.io/) platform from 26 April 2023.**
